pages.text: The $(major)Plasmid Infuser/$ uses FE to infuse $(l:geneticsresequenced:items/dna_helix)DNA Helices/$ into a $(l:geneticsresequenced:items/plasmid)Plasmid/$.$(br2)Insert an empty Plasmid in the right slot, and a DNA Helix in the left slot.$(br2)The DNA Helix will be used up, and set the Plasmid's Gene to match the Helix's.

Each Gene requires a certain amount of $(minor)DNA Points/$ for the Plasmid to be completed.$(br)$(li)Basic Genes are worth 1 point.$(li)Genes of the Plasmid's type are worth 2 points.$(br2)A Basic Gene cannot be the first one infused into a Plasmid.
